@graph.name: Summer Cancer Bootcamp 2025
@graph.description: The Summer Cancer Bootcamp is an immersive 10-day program designed to provide 30 early-career scientists and clinicians with intensive training in cancer research methodologies. The curriculum covers the history of cancer, oncogenes, tumor microenvironment, therapy resistance, epigenetics, and cancer metabolism. It includes hands-on workshops, grant writing sessions, and career development mentoring.
